page.title: 09A Detached House in Kirkby
page.content: My name is Tony and I live in a detached house which has 4 bedrooms. Our street has no telephone or post box or places of work, but it does have a corner shop and 2 small greens which have 7 trees. Inside our house the heating is gas and electric and our cooker is electric. We have a single garage and a front and back garden. Altogether we have 9 rooms excluding the hall and landing. The age of the house is approximately 30 years. We have not had any extensions built but we have had a wall knocked down and double glazing fitted. Our nearest amenities are the corner shop, Ruffwood Comprehensive School, which is the one I will be going to next year and Kirkby Church of England School, which is the one I go to now.
